meanings.definition: Expressing or intending to promote a particular cause or point of view, especially a controversial one.

meanings.sent3: His tendentiousness argument was so one-sided, it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The tendentiousness nature of the debate made it hard to see the truth.

meanings.definition: Bias or prejudice in favor of a particular viewpoint.
meanings.sent1: The tendentiousness of the report was evident in its selective use of data.
meanings.sent2: Her tendentiousness towards that political party was well-known.
meanings.sent3: The tendentiousness in his decision-making process was comical at times.
